isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

svcproc.title: CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Install Corner and Side Interior Trim Panel on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 102 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place passenger side corner and side interior trim panel (Item 5) inside the cab.

Position passenger side corner and side interior trim panel (Item 5) over mounting holes in cab side panel and rear interior trim panel and install seven push-in fasteners (Item 4), passenger side shown.

Position shoulder belt (Item 2) in place on corner and side interior trim panel (Item 5) inside cab and install torx head bolt (Item 1), passenger side shown. Tighten to 20 to 25 Lbf-ft (27 to 34 N•m).

Install passenger bucket seat, fixed passenger seat, two man fixed bench seat without tool box or two man fixed bench seat with tool box, refer to
SEATS
. For installing passenger bucket seat, refer to Install Passenger Bucket Seat on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. For installing fixed passenger seat, refer to Install Fixed Passenger Seat on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. For installing two man fixed bench seat without tool box, refer to Install Two Man Fixed Bench Seat without Tool Box on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. For installing two man fixed bench seat with tool box, refer to Install Two Man Fixed Bench Seat with Tool Box on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Install passenger side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover, refer to
CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.
Repeat procedure to install driver side corner and side interior trim panel on standard cab.

svcsubproc.title: Install Corner and Side Interior Trim Panel on Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 103 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place passenger side corner and side interior trim panel (Item 5) inside the cab.

Position passenger side corner and side interior trim panel (Item 5) over mounting holes in cab side panel and rear interior trim panel and install nine push-in fasteners (Item 4), passenger side shown.
Position shoulder belt (Item 2) in place on corner and side interior trim panel (Item 5) and install torx head bolt (Item 1), passenger side shown. Tighten to 20 to 25 Lbf-ft (27 to 34 N•m).

Install passenger bucket seat or fixed passenger seat and if so equipped, full width rear bench seat. Refer to
SEATS
. For installing passenger bucket seat, refer to Install Passenger Bucket Seat on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. For installing fixed passenger seat, refer to Install Fixed Passenger Seat on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. For installing full width rear bench seat, refer to Install Full Width Rear Bench Seat on Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

If so equipped, install bunk/storage unit from behind front seats, refer to
EXTENDED CAB BUNK/STORAGE UNIT
. For installing bunk/storage unit, refer to Install Bunk/Storage Unit on Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models.

Install passenger side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover, refer to
CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.
Repeat procedure to install driver side corner and side interior trim panel on extended cab.

svcsubproc.title: Install Corner and Side Interior Trim Panel on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 104 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place passenger side corner and side interior trim panel (Item 5) inside the cab.

Position passenger side corner and side interior trim panel (Item 5) over mounting holes in cab side panel and rear interior trim panel and install seven push-in fasteners (Item 4), passenger side shown.
Position shoulder belt (Item 2) in place on corner and side interior trim panel (Item 5) and install torx head bolt (Item 1), passenger side shown. Tighten to 20 to 25 Lbf-ft (27 to 34 N•m).

Install full width rear bench seat, refer to
SEATS
. For installing full width rear bench seat, refer to Install Full Width Rear Bench Seat on Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Install passenger side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover, refer to
CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.
Repeat procedure to install driver side corner and side interior trim panel on crew cab.
